result.reason: Enables folders to inherit credentials from any ancestor, not just the immediate parent, simplifying configuration for deep hierarchies.
result.approach: Modify TryGetInheritedPropertyValue in ConnectionInfo.cs to recursively traverse up the parent tree when checking for credential properties (Username, Password, Domain) if the immediate parent's values are empty.
